concept.title: Key Metrics Report
concept.shortdesc: The Key Metrics Report lets you compare metrics to see whether they trend together. For example, as your page views increase, does your visitor count increase?

draft-comment.p: Social Media: You can use the Key Metrics Report to examine social groups, such as Total Mentions or Audience Sentiment, and see how they are affecting revenue. How do you tie key metrics like Revenue to Social metrics? Look at the KM report by those groupings--total mentions, total audience, mapped to revenue. i.e. tv grouping, computing grouping, to see if it spikes or drives revenue.
